timestamp_to_date_converter.description: Convert timestamps between different formats or systems. Ideal for development, logging, and date manipulation.
timestamp_to_date_converter.instructions: Accepts Unix timestamp (seconds) or dates like 2025-03-28 15:00, 28/03/2025 etc.

unicode_to_text_converter.title: Unicode ↔ Text Converter
unicode_to_text_converter.description: Convert Unicode characters to readable text and vice versa. Ideal for internationalization, encoding and string manipulation.

unit_converter.title: Unit Converter
unit_converter.description: Convert units intelligently and conveniently. Ideal for screen measurements, distance, temperature, time and more.

url_encoder_decoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
url_encoder_decoder.description: Encode and decode URLs quickly and easily. Ideal for ensuring character compatibility in HTTP requests and links.

uuid_generator.title: UUID Generator
uuid_generator.description: Generate unique UUIDs (v4 or v1) with multiple output options. Ideal for testing, logging, and global object identification.

validador_de_cnpj.title: CNPJ Validator
validador_de_cnpj.description: Validate CNPJ numbers quickly and accurately. Ideal for tax applications, business registrations and data verification.

validador_de_cpf.title: CPF Validator
validador_de_cpf.description: Validate CPF numbers quickly and accurately. Ideal for registration systems, user validation and tax applications.

vehicle_plate_generator.title: License Plate Generator
vehicle_plate_generator.description: Generate valid license plates based on state and choose whether to include punctuation. Ideal for testing and simulations.

what_is_my_ip.title: What is my IP?
what_is_my_ip.description: Find out your current IP address and the corresponding reverse DNS. Ideal for network diagnostics, security and connection verification.
what_is_my_ip.intro: IP (Internet Protocol) is a unique address assigned to each device connected to the internet.
what_is_my_ip.ip_label: My IP address at the moment is:
what_is_my_ip.ip_types: There are two main types of IP addresses:
what_is_my_ip.ipv6: IPv6: longer, with letters and numbers (ex: 2001:0db8:85a3::8a2e:0370:7334)

word_character_line_sentence_counter.title: Word, character, line and sentence counter
word_character_line_sentence_counter.description: Count the number of words, characters, lines and sentences in a text. Ideal for checking limits in forms, articles and social networks.
word_character_line_sentence_counter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

world_clock.title: World Time
world_clock.description: Check the current time in many cities around the world, or enter a time zone to get the exact local time.

yaml_to_json_converter.title: YAML → JSON Converter
yaml_to_json_converter.description: Convert YAML files to JSON format easily and efficiently. Ideal for configurations, APIs, and structured data manipulation.

yaml_to_json_to_yaml_converter.title: YAML ↔ JSON Converter
yaml_to_json_to_yaml_converter.description: Convert YAML files to JSON format and vice versa in a simple and efficient way. Ideal for developers working with configuration and data manipulation.

zindex_layering_generator.title: Z-Index Layering Generator
zindex_layering_generator.description: Visualize and control element overlap with position and z-index. Ideal for understanding stacking in CSS.
